typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'Transaction.cdm.json/Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	corpusPath: 'CDMfolders/corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'CDMfolders',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ManifestSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'account',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'model',
	folderPath: 'account',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ModelSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'DimAttributeMainAccountEntity.cdm.json/DimAttributeMainAccountEntity',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'core',
	corpusPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/manifests/core/operationsCommon/Entities/Finance/FinancialDimensions',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/manifests/core',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
ManifestSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'DimAttributeMainAccountEntity.cdm.json/DimAttributeMainAccountEntity',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestName: 'core',
	corpusPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/manifests/core/operationsCommon/Entities/Finance/FinancialDimensions',
	folderPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/core/operationsCommon/Entities/Finance/FinancialDimensions/financialCommon',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
